medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Sudden onset of diffuse abdominal pain radiating to the back, with vomiting, experienced for 5 days. Pain persisted throughout the 4-day admission. Patient developed jaundice, and nausea/vomiting occurred during the first two days but was controlled with medication.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Incision and drainage of a staph infection on his left arm; No other past medical history specified.
